1463.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

1944.author: bsiegmund
1944.message: Run Button now moving when window is resized

1950.author: lauritz
1950.message: fixed a bug (onBlur event handling) and added the world to the target chooser

1954.author: lauritz
1954.message: Refactoring of script annotations (now at scripts not morphs). Added category tagging. Layout changes.

1958.author: lauritz
1958.message: two more checks on attempts to remove scripts or connections.

1960.author: lauritz
1960.message: added confirmation before removal of scripts or connections.

1962.author: lauritz
1962.message: Adapted the update behavior on ticks. Reduces the impact of HTML's autoscroll to selected list items.

1964.author: lauritz
1964.message: Locked down submorphs of the editor pane. Grabbing and dragging disabled.

1972.author: lauritz
1972.message: removed a missed debugger statement. corrected setting of target.

1974.author: lauritz
1974.message: added a border to notifications, centered notification text

1978.author: lauritz

1980.author: lauritz
1980.message: fixed a bug regarding anonymous morphs.

1982.author: lauritz
1982.message: workaround for issue #161 - target morph list is scrollable

1986.author: lauritz
1986.message: tries to get user directly from localStorage now. if there's no user set, then we don't call CGI - logging into trac should not be necessary for developing parts.
